reviewText: The dvds are scratched and keep freezing . These were supposed to be brand new.  I paid alot of money for a show I can't even watch

just started watching the series, encountered no problems yet.  only REAL complaint are with the discs for Season 3 & 4; HOW ARE WE SUPPOSED TO KNOW WHICH EPISODE IS ON WHICH DISC??  unless it's imprinted in lettering visible with special glasses and/or UV light, none of the discs have the Episode Titles on them.  the pictures on the discs are very pretty, though.
I'm taking my time with this one, savouring some quality video. Love the dry humor. Gotta love that "Big Bug".
